item.title: Best Travel Books to Ignite Your Wanderlust
item.description: If you’re looking to satisfy your wanderlust but can’t quite afford a plane ticket, why not try these five travel books that will transport you to far-off lands and inspire you to plan your next adventure? The Alchemist by Paulo Coelho, a magical and enchanting story that follows a young shepherd named Santiago as he travels from Spain to Egypt in search of treasure and his personal legend. Along the way, he meets a number of fascinating characters who teach him the importance of following his dreams.
